item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, May 25, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

6. Programming on 34 Keys (2022) (31 points | 29 comments)

11. Now you can watch the Internet Archive preserve documents in real time (39 points | 1 comment)

13. Why old games never die, but new ones do (227 points | 224 comments)

20. Show HN: Open-source protein and ligand viewer (4 points | discuss)
21. Space is not a wall: toward a less architectural level design (48 points | 12 comments)
22. Hydra: Vehicles on the island – 'After the works they abandon them here' (25 points | 21 comments)
23. Show HN: Rotary Phone Dial Linux Kernel Driver (320 points | 46 comments)
24. You’re a little company, now act like one (2009) (236 points | 46 comments)
25. Peer Programming with LLMs, for Senior+ Engineers (184 points | 78 comments)
26. Contacts let you see in the dark with your eyes closed (79 points | 11 comments)
27. Hong Kong's Famous Bamboo Scaffolding Hangs on (For Now) (192 points | 55 comments)

29. An Almost Pointless Exercise in GPU Optimization (68 points | 2 comments)
30. Lone coder cracks 50-year puzzle to find Boggle's top-scoring board (162 points | 33 comments)
